resources: Traffic Code Quiz submit answers reset Welcome to the Czech Traffic Code quiz! /** * Questions */ 1) Who has the right of way at the intersection with no signs? 2) What is the speed limit in pedestrian zone? 3) Which of following things are the part of required equipment? 4) What is the speed limit outside pedestrian area? 5) Which side of the road do we use? 6) In case of fuel engine, the oil must be replaced every ... kilometres. 7) What is the speed limit on highway? 8) Which of following signs mean \'you are on the priority road\'? 9) What do we have to check before driving a car? 10) Seatbelts are obligatory for: /** * Answers */ The largest or heaviest car The car coming from the right side The car coming from the left side Kilometres per hour Kilometres Extra tyre Extra fuel Extra light bulbs Car manual First aid kit Fire extinguisher 90 kph 80 kph 70 kph Full width Left Right 130 kph 140 kph 120 kph Wheels Brakes Car colour Sun position Amount of fuel Wind direction Driver All passengers Aggressive passengers /** * Toast messages */ %1$s, your score is %2$d. Please don\'t drive! %1$s, your score is %2$d. Take some lessons before driving a car. %1$s, your score is %2$d. Well done %1$s! You probably drive regularly. %1$s, your score is %2$d. Awesome, you can start own driving school! Type your name here
